original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett talks Rocky Linux with Gregory Kurtzer and Krista Burdine! Where did the project come from, and whats the connection with CIQ and RESF? Listen to find out!


CentOS primer
Migration from CentOS
Rocky Linux
RESF FAQ
CIQ Open Source Ethos


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: - Rocky Linuxの背景とCIQとの関係
body: 今週のポッドキャストでJonathanがRocky Linuxについて語る。プロジェクトの由来やCIQ、RESFとの関係を探る。
titles: - Rocky Linuxの背景とCIQとの関係
- RESFのよくある質問まとめ
- FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャストの最新エピソード
- YouTubeでのライブ録画視聴のご案内
